document.full_text: whistleblower protections in a federal accounting law do not cover leaks to the media, a u.s. appeals court has ruled, dealing a blow to two former boeing auditors who had sued the company.
document.title: sarbanes law doesn't protect media leaks: court
lines_and_colors: whistleblower protections in a federal accounting law do not cover leaks to the media, a u.s. appeals court has ruled, dealing a blow to two former boeing auditors who had sued the company.
